description: OpenNTCIP is working on a number of projects related to traffic control at all levels: the traffic controller in the field, the traffic management center, traffic simulation, and coordination between vehicles and the traffic management system.

projects.title: Traffic Controller NTCIP Editor
projects.description: An auto-generated web application for editing NTCIP traffic control objects.

projects.title: Traffic Controller NTCIP Database
projects.description: An database for NTCIP traffic control objects.

projects.title: Traffic Controller Emulator
projects.description: An emulator for a traffic controller.

projects.title: Traffic Simulator
projects.description: An simulator for a traffic traffic to enable vehicle/pedestrian detections for an emulated traffic controller.

projects.title: Traffic Simulator Map
projects.description: A geographical map showing simulated traffic and traffic controller outputs.
